message.content:
cs.DB, cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.FL. 

The paper discusses a system for the static analysis of XML processing languages, which involves translating XPath expressions and XML schemas into a fixpoint modal logic with converse. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including cs.DB (databases), cs.PL (programming languages), cs.LO (logic in computer science), cs.SE (software engineering), and cs.FL (formal languages and automata theory). However, given the focus on static analysis and program verification, cs.DB and cs.PL seem to be the most likely categories. The paper could also be relevant to researchers in cs.LO, cs.SE, and cs.FL who are interested in formal methods and logic-based approaches to software engineering.
